review: I enjoy watching my favorite Amazon Prime shows on the big screen rather than my kindle or laptop. Navigating the programs can be time consuming by alphabet though there is an app that can be used once down loaded to your smart phone. It's voice activated. I have not used this app yet.  With that being said, I dislike having to unplug my cable to insert the fire stick. Then again remove the fire stick to insert my cable wire. Any suggestions would be appreciated.
